Content: Different FTL-methods should be possible and unlockabel through tech.
Some cultures or species may have affinities for certain kinds of ftl
travel, to make them more unique. To make playtroughs more unique not
all methods should be possile in all games. This should be randomised.
(So at tge start of the game I do not know if i have to take a shortcut
trough hell or if I could simply create a comfortable wormhole)
